summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2984, for the improvement of North 40th Street, from Stone Way to Woodlawn Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same by constructing concrete sidewalks and by providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 35911 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
